title: Negative six degrees greenhouse update video for February 2019

subtasks: Check greenhouse temperature during extreme cold
Compare greenhouse temperature to external temperature
Assess performance of heating system in extreme conditions
Consider factors affecting heat retention (e.g., lack of sun)

Encourage viewer interaction via comments

MAINTASK: Update greenhouse during cold weather. SUBTASKS: Check temp inside, compare to outside, consider factors, express satisfaction. Then MAINTASK: Provide content creation feedback. SUBTASKS: Acknowledge viewers, invite questions. That seems to flow. So the transcript is relevant to farming, specifically greenhouse operations, so no need to flag it as irrelevant. The user is talking about crop protection (the greenhouse) in a farming context.
